objects.text:
• Premium Unisex Formula
• Versatile Day & Evening Use
• Elegant 100ml Design
• Luxury For Everyone

product_details.name: BELLAVITA Fresh Unisex EDT - Invigorating Luxury Fragrance for All
product_details.description:
• Premium unisex eau de toilette suitable for all gender expressions
• Generous 100ml/3.4 fl. oz size for long-lasting use
• Sleek turquoise bottle design with elegant gold cap
• Fresh, contemporary scent perfect for daily wear
• Professional-grade fragrance in sophisticated packaging
• Versatile scent profile suitable for both day and evening use
• Travel-friendly bottle size compliant with most airline regulations
• Luxurious BELLAVITA® brand quality guarantee
• Modern unisex formula breaking traditional fragrance boundaries
• Perfect gift choice for fragrance enthusiasts

banner_details:
This banner showcases a modern and vibrant promotional layout for a unisex fragrance. The design features a bold main headline (`heading`) in a warm golden hue, followed by a catchy subheadline (`subheading`) in aqua blue. A sleek tagline (`tagline`) sits beneath, written in elegant white typography, reinforcing the product's essence. Bullet points (`description`) list standout features in white for easy readability against the geometrically divided teal and navy background. The pricing (`price`) is emphasized in a large, bold font in yellow-gold, placed above a wide-eyed call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with strong, dark teal text (`cta`). A realistic product image (`product_image`) is positioned on the right to balance the textual content, completing the premium aesthetic.

**Color Palette:**
- Aqua Blue (#17D1CE)
- Teal (#12BDBA, #15C2C0)
- Navy Blue (#1A3A48, #0F2A38)
- Warm Yellow-Gold (#F0D082)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases a vibrant and modern design with a dominant aqua teal base color (#00B7B2), giving it a refreshing and invigorating appearance. This teal tone evokes a sense of coolness, aligning with the "Fresh" branding. The text and logo are rendered in a warm gold-beige shade (#F6E7C2), which stands out clearly and adds a premium touch. The cap of the bottle is a metallic gold (#D4AF37), reflecting light beautifully and enhancing the luxurious aesthetic. These colors are harmoniously blended yet distinctly highlighted, creating a sleek composition ideal for a chic, minimalist ad banner.
